raw_response:
Dbih'a b'tmatem is visually characterized as a **rich, deep red tomato-based stew** with a thick, hearty consistency resulting from slow cooking that concentrates and thickens the tomato sauce. When served, it appears as a vibrant red stew, neither soupy nor fully solid, but more on the thick stew side, allowing it to coat the chunks of potato and plant-based protein well.
